channel.title: Hawk bug
channel.description:
Well I rolledback wake_rider like fully because he'd been griefing my stuff at spawn for 99 but I never noticed, that was fine but for some reason some of the stuff he griefed hasn't come back even though it appeared on /hawk tool
Also, there was a bug (sort of) when doing this - it destroyed one off his chests and all his items went on the floor then disappeared then I went round to inspect ad they had all gone and another chest was there now I'm just getting internal errors on stuff though he had griefed quite a lot
1) 200 torches (estimate) 2) an entire train station 3) cleared spawn and the underground of it
Roughly 2000 edits (probably less) that weren't including his house - so maybe it's due to the vast rollback it's done this? Even if this bug has broken his chest it's serves him right anyway.
PS if you try to undo it it says internal error while performing this action as well.

item.title: Hawk bug
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

All the plugins have been updated to the latest version, including this one, so who knows?

Read full topic

item.title: Hawk bug
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Sorry for the late response my ISP completely cocked up the internet connection to my area, so I have been without internet for a few days.

I initially thought it may have been that BUT it only finished when I did the command again (lack of detail in above and so on) it’s like one command just couldn’t do the job. I’m not sure if there is some kind of block roll back limit (which I doubt).

I may seem a little of the ball recently I have about 12 exams one after the other if anyone has noticed.

Read full topic

item.title: Hawk bug
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

It sounds like it just took some time to finish the rollback?

Read full topic

item.title: Hawk bug

item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

I’ve noticed hawk tool not completely rolling people back sometimes too.

Read full topic

item.title: Hawk bug
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Right this tool is stupid, it’s rolled him back in some areas and not in others…

I don’t know what’s gone wrong but I’ve used the furthest rollback possible and it’s done it for most off it, but decided by itself to keep some new blocks!

NEVER MIND ALL IS WELL NOW, SOME HOW IT IS FIXED.

Read full topic
